properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , CATEGORY_NO , POINT , MEM_STATUS , ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , MEM_NAME , MEM_BIRTH , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
